luka:11:43: 43.“Muzabona ishyano Bafarisayo, kuko mukunda intebe z’icyubahiro mu masinagogi, no kuramukirizwa mu maguriro!
luka:11:44: 44.Muzabona ishyano kuko mumeze nk’ibituro bitagaragara, abantu bakabigendaho batabizi!”
luka:11:45: 45.Umwe mu bigishamategeko aramusubiza ati “Mwigisha, ubwo uvuze utyo natwe uradututse.”
luka:11:46: 46.Aramubwira ati “Namwe abigishamategeko muzabona ishyano, kuko mwikoreza abantu imitwaro idaterurwa, namwe ubwanyu ntimuyikozeho n’urutoki!
luka:11:47: 47.Muzabona ishyano kuko mwubaka ibituro by’abahanuzi, ba sogokuruza banyu ari bo babishe!
luka:11:48: 48.Uko ni ko mwihamije ko mushima ibyo ba sogokuruza banyu bakoze, kuko ari bo babishe namwe mukabubakira ibituro.
luka:11:49: 49.Ni cyo cyatumye Imana ivugisha ubwenge bwayo iti ‘Nzabatumaho abahanuzi n’intumwa bamwe muri bo bazabica, abandi bazabarenganya’,
luka:11:50: 50.kugira ngo amaraso y’abahanuzi bose yavuye uhereye ku kuremwa kw’isi abazwe ab’iki gihe,
luka:11:51: 51.uhereye ku maraso ya Abeli ukageza ku maraso ya Zakariya wiciwe hagati y’igicaniro n’urusengero. Ni koko ndababwira yuko azabazwa ab’iki gihe.
luka:11:52: 52.“Muzabona ishyano abigishamategeko, kuko mwatwaye urufunguzo rw’ubwenge ubwanyu ntimwinjira, n’abashakaga kwinjira mwarababujije!”
luka:11:53: 53.Nuko asohotse, abanditsi n’Abafarisayo batangira kumuhataniraho cyane no kumwiyenzaho ngo bamuvugishe byinshi,
luka:11:54: 54.bashaka kumutega kugira ngo bamufateho ijambo rizamushinja.
luka:12:1: Twe gutinya abantu (Mat 10.28-33)1.Muri icyo gihe abantu ibihumbi byinshi bateranira aho ari, ndetse bigeza aho bakandagirana. Nuko abwira abigishwa be ati “Mubanze mwirinde umusemburo w’Abafarisayo ari wo buryarya,
luka:12:2: 2.kuko ari nta cyatwikiriwe kitazatwikururwa, cyangwa icyahishwe kitazamenyekana.
luka:12:3: 3.Nuko ibyo mwavugiye mu mwijima byose bizumvikanira mu mucyo, n’icyo mwongoreraniye mu mazu imbere kizavugirwa hejuru yayo.
luka:12:4: 4.“Kandi ndababwira mwebwe ncuti zanjye nti ‘Ntimugatinye abica umubiri, hanyuma ntibagire ikindi babatwara.
luka:12:5: 5.Ahubwo ndabereka uwo mukwiriye gutinya: mutinye umara kwica umuntu agashobora kumujugunya muri Gehinomu. Ni koko, ndababwira abe ari we mutinya.’
luka:12:6: 6.“Mbese ibishwi bitanu ntibigurwa amakuta abiri? Nyamara nta na kimwe muri byo cyibagirana mu maso y’Imana.
luka:12:7: 7.Ndetse n’umusatsi wo ku mitwe yanyu wose warabazwe. Ntimutinye rero, kuko muruta ibishwi byinshi.
luka:12:8: 8.“Kandi ndababwira yuko uzampamiriza imbere y’abantu, nanjye Umwana w’umuntu nzamuhamiriza imbere y’abamarayika b’Imana,
luka:12:9: 9.ariko unyihakanira imbere y’abantu, na we azihakanirwa imbere y’abamarayika b’Imana.
luka:12:10: 10.“Kandi umuntu wese usebya Umwana w’umuntu azabibabarirwa, ariko utuka Umwuka Wera ntazabibabarirwa.
luka:12:11: 11.“Kandi nibabajyana mu masinagogi no mu batware no mu bakomeye, ntimuzahagarike umutima w’icyo muzireguza cyangwa w’ibyo muzavuga,
luka:12:12: 12.kuko Umwuka Wera azabigisha ibyo muzaba mukwiriye kuvuga muri uwo mwanya.”
luka:12:13: Umutunzi w’umupfapfa13.Nuko umuntu umwe wo muri iryo teraniro aramubwira ati “Mwigisha, bwira mwene data tugabane imyandu.”
luka:12:14: 14.Na we aramusubiza ati “Wa mugabo we, ni nde wanshyizeho kuba umucamanza wanyu, cyangwa ngo ngabanye ibyanyu?”
luka:12:15: 15.Arababwira ati “Mwitonde kandi mwirinde kwifuza kose, kuko ubugingo bw’umuntu butava mu bwinshi bw’ibintu bye.”
luka:12:16: 16.Nuko abacira umugani ati “Hariho umukungu wari ufite imirima irumbuka cyane,
luka:12:17: 17.nuko aribaza mu mutima we ati ‘Ndagira nte ko ntafite aho mpunika imyaka yanjye?’
luka:12:18: 18.Aribwira ati ‘Ndabigenza ntya: ndasenya urugarama rwanjye nubake urundi runini, abe ari mo mpunika imyaka yanjye yose n’ibintu byanjye.
luka:12:19: 19.Ni bwo nzabwira umutima wanjye nti: Mutima, ufite ibintu byinshi bibikiwe imyaka myinshi, ngaho ruhuka, urye unywe, unezerwe.’
luka:12:20: 20.Ariko Imana iramubwira iti ‘Wa mupfu we, muri iri joro uranyagwa ubugingo bwawe. Ibyo wabitse bizaba ibya nde?’
luka:12:21: 21.“Ni ko umuntu wirundaniriza ubutunzi amera, atari umutunzi mu by’Imana.”
luka:12:22: Ntimwiganyire (Mat 6.19-34)22.Abwira abigishwa be ati “Ni cyo gituma mbabwira nti: Ntimukiganyire ngo mutekereze iby’ubugingo muti ‘Tuzarya iki?’ Cyangwa iby’umubiri muti ‘Tuzambara iki?’
luka:12:23: 23.Kuko ubugingo buruta ibyokurya, n’umubiri uruta imyambaro.
luka:12:24: 24.Mwitegereze ibikona bitabiba ntibisarure, ntibigire ububiko cyangwa ikigega, nyamara Imana irabigaburira. Mwe se ntimuruta ibisiga cyane?
luka:12:25: 25.Ni nde muri mwe wabasha kwiyunguraho umukono umwe, abiheshejwe no kwiganyira?
luka:12:26: 26.Nuko ubwo mutabasha gukora igito rwose, ni iki kibaganyisha ibindi?
luka:12:27: 27.Mwitegereze uburabyo uko bumera: ntibugira umurimo bukora, ntibuboha imyenda, ariko ndababwira yuko Salomo mu bwiza bwe bwose atarimbaga nka kamwe muri bwo.
luka:12:28: 28.Ariko Imana ubwo yambika ubwatsi bwo mu gasozi ityo, buriho none n’ejo bakabujugunya mu muriro, ntizarushaho kubambika mwebwe abafite kwizera guke mwe?
luka:12:29: 29.“Ntimugahagarike umutima wo gushaka ibyokurya n’ibyokunywa, kandi ntimwiganyire.
luka:12:30: 30.Ibyo byose abapagani bo mu isi ni byo bashaka, burya So aba azi ko namwe mubikennye.
luka:12:31: 31.Ahubwo mushake ubwami bwe, kuko ari ho ibyo muzabyongerwa.
luka:12:32: 32.“Mwa mukumbi muto mwe, ntimutinye kuko So yishimira kubaha ubwami.
luka:12:33: 33.Mugure ibyo mufite, mutange ku buntu. Mwidodere udusaho tudasaza, ari bwo butunzi budashira buri mu ijuru, aho umujura atabwegera n’inyenzi ntizibwonone,
luka:12:34: 34.kuko aho ubutunzi bwanyu buri, ari ho n’imitima yanyu izaba.
luka:12:35: Tube maso dutegereje kugaruka k’Umwami Yesu (Mat 24.45-51)35.“Muhore mukenyeye kandi amatabaza yanyu yake,
luka:12:36: 36.mumere nk’abantu bategereza shebuja aho agarukira ava mu bukwe, kugira ngo ubwo azaza nakomanga bamukingurire vuba.
luka:12:37: 37.Hahirwa abagaragu shebuja azaza agasanga bari maso. Ndababwira ukuri yuko azakenyera, akabicaza akabahereza.
luka:12:38: 38.Naza mu gicuku cyangwa mu nkoko agasanga bameze batyo, bazaba bahirwa.
luka:12:39: 39.Kandi mumenye ibi yuko nyir’inzu iyaba yamenyaga igihe umujura azazira, yabaye maso, ntiyakunze ko inzu icukurwa.
luka:12:40: 40.Namwe muhore mwiteguye, kuko Umwana w’umuntu azaza mu gihe mudatekereza.”
luka:12:41: 41.Petero aramubaza ati “Databuja, uwo mugani ni twe twenyine uwuciriye cyangwa ni abantu bose?”
luka:12:42: 42.Umwami Yesu aramusubiza ati “Ni nde gisonga gikiranuka cy’ubwenge, shebuja azasigira abo mu rugo rwe ngo abagerere igerero igihe cyaryo?
luka:12:43: 43.Hahirwa uwo mugaragu shebuja azaza agasanga abikora.
luka:12:44: 44.Ndababwira ukuri yuko azamwegurira ibyo afite byose.
luka:12:45: 45.Ariko uwo mugaragu niyibwira ati ‘Databuja aratinze’, agatangira gukubita abagaragu n’abaja, no kurya no kunywa no gusinda,
luka:12:46: 46.shebuja w’uwo mugaragu azaza umunsi atamutegereje n’igihe atazi, azamucamo kabiri amuhanane n’abakiranirwa.
luka:12:47: 47.“Kandi uwo mugaragu wari uzi ibyo shebuja ashaka, ntiyitegure ngo akore ibyo ashaka, azakubitwa inkoni nyinshi.
luka:12:48: 48.Ariko uwari utabizi agakora ibikwiriye kumuhanisha, azakubitwa nkeya. Uwahawe byinshi wese azabazwa byinshi, n’uweguriwe byinshi ni we bazarushaho kwaka byinshi.
luka:12:49: Abantu bazatandukana ku bwa Yesu (Mat 10.34-42)49.“Naje kujugunya umuriro mu isi, none niba umaze gufatwa ndacyashaka iki kandi?
luka:12:50: 50.Hariho umubatizo nkwiriye kuzabatizwa. Nyamuna uburyo mbabazwa kugeza aho uzasohorera!
luka:12:51: 51.Mbese mutekereza yuko nazanywe no kuzana amahoro mu isi? Ndababwira yuko atari ko biri, ahubwo naje gutanya abantu!
luka:12:52: 52.Kuko uhereye none hazabaho batanu mu nzu imwe badahuje, abatatu n’ababiri, kandi n’ababiri n’abatatu badahuje.
luka:12:53: 53.Umwana ntazahuza na se, na se n’umwana we ntibazahuza. Umukobwa ntazahuza na nyina, na nyina n’umukobwa we ntibazahuza. Umukazana ntazahuza na nyirabukwe, na nyirabukwe n’umukazana we ntibazahuza.”
luka:12:54: Abaza abantu igituma batamenya iby’igihe barimo (Mat 16.2-3)54.Nuko abwira abateraniye aho na bo ati “Iyo mubonye igicu kivuye iburengerazuba, uwo mwanya muravuga ngo ‘Imvura iragwa’, kandi ni ko biba.
luka:12:55: 55.N’iyo mubonye umuyaga uturutse ikusi, muravuga ngo ‘Haraba ubushyuhe’, kandi ni ko biba.
luka:12:56: 56.Mwa ndyarya mwe, ko muzi kugenzura isi n’ijuru, ni iki kibabuza kugenzura iby’iki gihe?
luka:12:57: 57.“Kandi namwe ubwanyu, ni iki kibabuza guhitamo ibitunganye?
luka:12:58: 58.Nujyana n’ukurega kuburanira ku mutware, ugire umwete mukiri mu nzira wikiranure na we ngo ye kugukururira ku mucamanza, umucamanza akagushyikiriza umusirikare, na we akagushyira mu nzu y’imbohe.
luka:12:59: 59.Ndakubwira yuko utazavamo rwose, keretse umaze kwishyura umwenda wose hadasigaye ikuta na rimwe.”
luka:13:1: Abanyagalilaya bishwe na Pilato1.Muri icyo gihe hari abantu bari bahari bamutekerereza iby’Abanyagalilaya, abo Pilato yavangiye amaraso yabo n’ibitambo byabo.
luka:13:2: 2.Yesu arabasubiza ati “Mbese mugira ngo abo Banyagalilaya bari abanyabyaha kuruta abandi Banyagalilaya, ubwo bababajwe batyo?
luka:13:3: 3.Ndababwira yuko atari ko biri, ahubwo namwe nimutihana muzarimbuka mutyo mwese.
luka:13:4: 4.Cyangwa se ba bandi cumi n’umunani, abo umunara w’i Silowamu wagwiriye ukabica, mugira ngo bari abanyabyaha kuruta abandi b’i Yerusalemu bose?
luka:13:5: 5.Ndababwira yuko atari ko biri, ahubwo namwe nimutihana muzarimbuka mutyo mwese.”
luka:13:6: Umugani w’umutini warumbye6.Kandi abacira uyu mugani ati “Hariho umuntu wateye umutini mu ruzabibu rwe, bukeye araza awushakaho imbuto arazibura.
luka:13:7: 7.Abwira umuhinzi ati ‘Dore none uyu mwaka ni uwa gatatu, nza gushaka imbuto kuri uyu mutini sinzibone. Uwuce, urakomeza kunyunyuriza iki ubutaka?’
luka:13:8: 8.Na we aramusubiza ati ‘Databuja, uwureke uyu mwaka na wo, nywuhingire nywufumbire,
luka:13:9: 9.ahari hanyuma wakwera imbuto. Icyakora nutera uzawuce.’ ”
luka:13:10: Umugore uhetamye akizwa na Yesu10.Nuko ku munsi w’isabato yigishiriza mu isinagogi.
luka:13:11: 11.Asangamo umugore ufite dayimoni utera ubumuga, uwo mugore yari amaze imyaka cumi n’umunani ahetamye, atabasha kunamuka na hato.
luka:13:12: 12.Yesu amubonye aramuhamagara aramubwira ati “Mugore, ubohowe ubumuga bwawe.”
luka:13:13: 13.Amurambikaho ibiganza, muri ako kanya aragororoka ahagarara yemye, ahimbaza Imana.
luka:13:14: 14.Ariko umutware w’isinagogi arakazwa n’uko Yesu akijije umuntu ku isabato, abwira abantu ati “Hariho iminsi itandatu ikwiriye gukorerwamo imirimo, abe ari yo muzamo mukizwe hatari ku munsi w’isabato.”
luka:13:15: 15.Umwami Yesu aramusubiza ati “Mwa ndyarya mwe, mbese umuntu wese muri mwe ntazitura inka ye cyangwa indogobe ye, ayikura mu kiraro ku isabato, akayijyana akayuhira?
luka:13:16: 16.Kandi uyu ko ari umukobwa wa Aburahamu, akaba amaze iyi myaka cumi n’umunani aboshywe na Satani, ntiyari akwiye kubohorwa iyi ngoyi ku munsi w’isabato?”
luka:13:17: 17.Amaze kuvuga atyo abanzi be bose baramwara, abahateraniye bose bishimira imirimo myiza itangaza yose yakoze.
luka:13:18: Umugani w’akabuto ka sinapi (Mat 13.31-33; Mar 4.30-32)18.Nuko arabaza ati “Mbese ubwami bw’Imana bwagereranywa n’iki, cyangwa nabushushanya n’iki?
luka:13:19: 19.Dore bugereranywa n’akabuto ka sinapi, umuntu yenze akakabiba mu murima we, kagakura kakaba igiti maze inyoni zo mu kirere zikarika ibyari mu mashami yacyo.”
luka:13:20: 20.Yongera kuvuga ati “Ubwami bw’Imana ndabugereranya n’iki?
luka:13:21: 21.Busa n’umusemburo umugore yenze akawuhisha mu myariko itatu y’ifu, kugeza aho yose iri butubukire.”
luka:13:22: Babaza Yesu abakizwa uko bazangana (Mat 7.13-14,21-23)22.Ajya mu midugudu n’ibirorero yigisha, ari mu nzira ajya i Yerusalemu,
luka:13:23: 23.umuntu aramubaza ati “Databuja, mbese abakizwa ni bake?” Na we aramusubiza ati
luka:13:24: 24.“Mugire umwete wo kunyura mu irembo rifunganye. Ndababwira yuko benshi bazashaka kurinyuramo ntibabibashe.
luka:13:25: 25.Nyir’inzu namara guhaguruka agakinga urugi, namwe mugatangira kurukomangaho muhagaze hanze muvuga muti ‘Mwami, dukingurire’, azabasubiza ati ‘Simbazi, sinzi n’aho muturutse.’
luka:13:26: 26.Ni bwo muzavuga muti ‘Kandi twariraga imbere yawe, tukanywera imbere yawe, ndetse ukigishiriza mu nzira z’iwacu!’
luka:13:27: 27.Ariko azababwira ati ‘Sinzi aho muturutse. Nimumve imbere mwa nkozi z’ibibi mwe!’
luka:13:28: 28.Aho ni ho bazaririra bakahahekenyera amenyo, mubonye Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo n’abahanuzi bose bibereye mu bwami bw’Imana, namwe mukaba mujugunywe hanze.
luka:13:29: 29.Hazaza abava iburasirazuba n’iburengerazuba, n’ikasikazi n’ikusi, bicare basangirire mu bwami bw’Imana.
luka:13:30: 30.Kandi rero, hariho ab’inyuma bamwe bazaba ab’imbere, n’ab’imbere bamwe bazaba ab’inyuma.”
luka:13:31: Yesu aririra i Yerusalemu (Mat 23.37-39)31.Uwo munsi haza Abafarisayo bamwe baramubwira bati “Va hano, ugende kuko Herode ashaka kukwica.”
luka:13:32: 32.Arababwira ati “Nimugende mubwire iyo ngunzu muti ‘Dore arirukana abadayimoni, arakiza abantu none n’ejo, maze ku munsi wa gatatu azaba arangije rwose.’
luka:13:33: 33.Ariko nkwiriye kugenda none n’ejo n’ejo bundi, kuko bidashoboka ko umuhanuzi yicwa atari i Yerusalemu.
luka:13:34: 34.“Ayii! Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu we, wica abahanuzi ugatera amabuye abagutumweho! Ni kangahe nashatse kubundikira abana bawe, nk’uko inkoko ibundikira imishwi yayo mu mababa yayo ntimunkundire?
luka:13:35: 35.Dore inzu yanyu muyisigiwe ari umusaka, kandi ndababwira yuko mutazambona kugeza ubwo muzavuga muti ‘Hahirwa uje mu izina ry’Uwiteka.’ ”
luka:14:1: Yesu akiza umuntu urwaye urushwima1.Ku munsi w’isabato, yinjiye mu nzu y’umwe mu batware b’Abafarisayo ngo basangire baramugenza.
luka:14:2: 2.Imbere ye hariho umuntu urwaye urushwima.
luka:14:3: 3.Yesu abaza abigishamategeko n’Abafarisayo ati “Mbese amategeko yemera ko ari byiza gukiza umuntu ku isabato, cyangwa ntiyemera?”
luka:14:4: 4.Maze baraceceka. Amukoraho aramukiza, aramusezerera.
luka:14:5: 5.Nuko arababaza ati “Ni nde muri mwe waba ufite indogobe cyangwa inka, icyagwa mu iriba ntiyagikuramo muri ako kanya nubwo ari ku isabato?”
luka:14:6: 6.Ntibagira icyo bamusubiza muri ibyo.
luka:14:7: Uwishyira hejuru azacishwa bugufi7.Nuko acira abararitswe umugani, abonye uko bashaka intebe z’icyubahiro arababwira ati
luka:14:8: 8.“Nutorerwa gutaha ubukwe ntukicare ku ntebe y’icyubahiro, hataboneka undi watowe ukurusha igitinyiro
luka:14:9: 9.maze uwabatoye mwembi akaza akakubwira ati ‘Imukira uyu’, nawe ukahava umarwa n’isoni ujya kwicara inyuma y’abandi bose.
luka:14:10: 10.Ahubwo nutorwa ugende wicare inyuma y’abandi bose, kugira ngo uwagutoye aze kukwibwirira ati ‘Ncuti yanjye, igira imbere.’ Ni bwo uzabona icyubahiro imbere y’abo mwicaranye musangira,
luka:14:11: 11.kuko umuntu wese wishyira hejuru azacishwa bugufi, kandi uwicisha bugufi azashyirwa hejuru.”
luka:14:12: 12.Kandi abwira uwamuraritse ati “Nurarika abantu ngo musangire ku manywa cyangwa nijoro, ntukararike incuti zawe cyangwa bene so, cyangwa bene wanyu cyangwa abaturanyi b’abatunzi, batazakurarika nawe bakakwitura.
luka:14:13: 13.Ahubwo nurarika utumire abakene n’ibirema, n’abacumbagira n’impumyi,
luka:14:14: 14.ni bwo uzahirwa kuko bo badafite ibyo bakwitura, ahubwo uziturwa abakiranuka bazutse.”
luka:14:15: Umugani w’abararikwa babi (Mat 22.1-14)15.Nuko umwe muri abo bicaranye basangira abyumvise aramubwira ati “Hahirwa uzarira mu bwami bw’Imana.”
luka:14:16: 16.Na we aramubwira ati “Hariho umuntu watekesheje ibyokurya byinshi, ararika benshi.
luka:14:17: 17.Igihe cyo kurya gisohoye atuma umugaragu we kubwira abararitswe ati ‘Nimuze kuko bimaze kwitegurwa.’
luka:14:18: 18.Bose batangira gushaka impamvu z’urwitwazo bahuje umutima. Uwa mbere ati ‘Naguze umurima nkwiriye kujya kuwureba, ndakwinginze mbabarira.’
luka:14:19: 19.Undi ati ‘Naguze amapfizi cumi yo guhinga ngiye kuyagerageza, ndakwinginze mbabarira.’
luka:14:20: 20.Undi ati ‘Narongoye ni cyo gituma ntabasha kuza.’
luka:14:21: 21.“Nuko uwo mugaragu agarutse abwira shebuja uko byagenze. Maze nyir’urugo ararakara, abwira umugaragu we ati ‘Sohoka vuba ujye mu nzira nini n’into zo mu mudugudu, uzane hano abakene n’ibirema, n’impumyi n’abacumbagira.’
luka:14:22: 22.Umugaragu we agarutse aravuga ati ‘Databuja, icyo utegetse ndagikoze, nyamara haracyari umwanya w’abandi.’
luka:14:23: 23.Shebuja abwira umugaragu we ati ‘Sohoka ugende mu nzira nyabagendwa no mu mihora, ubahate kwinjira kugira ngo urugo rwanjye rwuzure.
luka:14:24: 24.Ndababwira yuko ari nta muntu wo muri ba bararikwa, uzarya ibyo nabiteguriye.’ ”
luka:14:25: Uburyo gukurikira Yesu biruhije (Mat 10.37-38)25.Abantu benshi bajyanaga na we, arahindukira arababwira ati
luka:14:26: 26.“Umuntu uza aho ndi ntiyange se na nyina, n’umugore we n’abana be, na bene se na bashiki be ndetse n’ubugingo bwe, uwo ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanjye.
luka:14:27: 27.Utikorera umusaraba we ngo ankurikire, ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanjye.
luka:14:28: 28.“Ni nde muri mwe ushaka kubaka inzu y’amatafari ndende, utabanza kwicara akabara umubare w’impiya zayubaka, ngo amenye yuko afite izikwiriye kuyuzuza?
luka:14:29: 29.Kugira ngo ahari ataba amaze gushyiraho urufatiro, akananirirwa aho atayujuje, maze ababireba bose bagatangira kumuseka bati
luka:14:30: 30.‘Uyu yatangiye kubaka inzu, ariko ntiyabasha kuyuzuza.’
luka:14:31: 31.“Cyangwa se hari umwami wajya kurwana n’undi, ntabanze kwicara ngo ajye inama yuko yabasha gutabarana n’ingabo ze inzovu imwe, ngo arwane n’umuteye afite ingabo ze inzovu ebyiri?
luka:14:32: 32.Bitabaye bityo, wa wundi akiri kure cyane atuma intumwa ze, akamubaza icyo yamuhongera ngo babane amahoro.
luka:14:33: 33.Nuko rero namwe, umuntu wese muri mwe udasiga ibyo afite byose, ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanjye.
luka:14:34: 34.“Umunyu ni mwiza, ariko umunyu iyo ukayutse uryoshywa n’iki?
luka:14:35: 35.Nta n’ubwo ukwiriye umurima habe n’icukiro, bapfa kuwujugunya hanze. Ufite amatwi yumva niyumve.”
luka:15:1: Intama yazimiye n’igice cy’ifeza cyabuze (Mat 18.12-14)1.Nuko abakoresha b’ikoro bose n’abanyabyaha baramwegera ngo bamwumve.
luka:15:2: 2.Abafarisayo n’abanditsi barabyivovotera bati “Uyu yiyegereza abanyabyaha, kandi agasangira na bo.”
luka:15:3: 3.Abacira uyu mugani ati
luka:15:4: 4.“Ni nde muri mwe waba afite intama ijana akazimiza imwe muri zo, ntasige izindi mirongo urwenda n’icyenda mu gasozi, akajya gushaka iyazimiye kugeza aho ari buyibonere?
luka:15:5: 5.Iyo ayibonye ayiterera ku bitugu yishimye,
luka:15:6: 6.yagera mu rugo agahamagara incuti ze n’abaturanyi be akababwira ati ‘Twishimane kuko mbonye intama yanjye yari yazimiye.’
luka:15:7: 7.Ndababwira yuko mu ijuru bazishimira batyo umunyabyaha umwe wihannye, kumurutisha abakiranuka mirongo urwenda n’icyenda badakwiriye kwihana.
luka:15:8: 8.“Cyangwa umugore waba afite ibice cumi by’ifeza, yaburamo kimwe ntiyakongeza itabaza, agakubura mu nzu, akagira umwete wo gushaka kugeza aho akibonera?
luka:15:9: 9.Iyo akibonye ahamagara incuti ze n’abaturanyi be akababwira ati ‘Twishimane kuko mbonye igice nari nabuze.’
luka:15:10: 10.Ndababwira yuko ari ko haba umunezero mwinshi imbere y’abamarayika b’Imana, bishimira umunyabyaha umwe wihannye.”
luka:15:11: Umugani w’umwana w’ikirara11.Kandi arababwira ati “Hariho umuntu wari ufite abahungu babiri.
luka:15:12: 12.Umuhererezi abwira se ati ‘Data, mpa umugabane w’ibintu unkwiriye.’ Nuko agabanya amatungo ye.
luka:15:13: 13.Iminsi mike ishize umuhererezi ateranya ibintu bye byose, aragenda ajya mu gihugu cya kure, yayisha ibintu bye ubugoryi bwe.
luka:15:14: 14.Abimaze byose inzara nyinshi itera muri icyo gihugu, atangira gukena.
luka:15:15: 15.Aragenda ahakwa ku muntu wo muri icyo gihugu, amwohereza mu gikingi cye kuragira ingurube.
luka:15:16: 16.Yifuza guhazwa n’ibyo izo ngurube zaryaga, ariko ntihagira ubimuha.
luka:15:17: 17.Nuko yisubiyemo aribwira ati ‘Abagaragu ba data ni benshi kandi bahazwa n’imitsima bakayisigaza, naho jye inzara intsinze hano.
luka:15:18: 18.Reka mpaguruke njye kwa data mubwire nti: Data, nacumuye ku Yo mu ijuru no maso yawe,
luka:15:19: 19.ntibinkwiriye kwitwa umwana wawe, mpaka mbe nk’umugaragu wawe.’
luka:15:20: 20.Arahaguruka ajya kwa se. “Agituruka kure, se aramubona aramubabarira, arirukanka aramuhobera, aramusoma.
luka:15:21: 21.Uwo mwana aramubwira ati ‘Data, nacumuye ku Yo mu ijuru no mu maso yawe, ntibinkwiriye kwitwa umwana wawe.’
luka:15:22: 22.Ariko se abwira abagaragu be ati ‘Mwihute muzane vuba umwenda uruta iyindi muwumwambike, mumwambike n’impeta ku rutoki n’inkweto mu birenge,
luka:15:23: 23.muzane n’ikimasa kibyibushye mukibage turye twishime,
luka:15:24: 24.kuko uyu mwana wanjye yari yarapfuye none akaba azutse, yari yarazimiye none dore arabonetse.’ Nuko batangira kwishima.
luka:15:25: 25.“Ariko umwana we w’imfura yari ari mu murima, amaze kuza ageze hafi y’urugo yumva abacuranga n’ababyina.
luka:15:26: 26.Ahamagara umugaragu amubaza ibyabaye ibyo ari byo.
luka:15:27: 27.Aramubwira ati ‘Murumuna wawe yaje none so yamubagiye ikimasa kibyibushye, kuko amubonye ari muzima.’
luka:15:28: 28.“Undi ararakara yanga kwinjira, nuko se arasohoka aramwinginga.
luka:15:29: 29.Maze asubiza se ati ‘Maze imyaka myinshi ngukorera, ntabwo nanze itegeko ryawe. Ariko hari ubwo wigeze umpa n’agasekurume, ngo nishimane n’incuti zanjye?
luka:15:30: 30.Maze uyu mwana wawe yaza, wamaze ibyawe abisambanisha, akaba ari we ubagira ikimasa kibyibushye!’
luka:15:31: 31.Na we aramubwira ati ‘Mwana wanjye, turabana iteka kandi ibyanjye byose ni ibyawe,
luka:15:32: 32.ariko kwishima no kunezerwa biradukwiriye rwose, kuko murumuna wawe uyu yari yarapfuye none arazutse, yari yarazimiye none dore arabonetse.’ ”
luka:16:1: Yesu acira abantu umugani w’igisonga kibi1.Kandi abwira abigishwa be ati “Hariho umutunzi wari ufite igisonga cye, bakimuregaho ko cyaya ibintu bye.
luka:16:2: 2.Aragihamagara arakibwira ati ‘Ibyo nkumvaho ni ibiki? Murikira ibyo nakubikije kuko utagikwiriye kuba igisonga cyanjye.’
luka:16:3: 3.Icyo gisonga kiribwira kiti ‘Ko databuja ari bunyage ubutware bwanjye nkaba ntashobora guhinga, nkagira isoni zo gusabiriza, ndagira nte?
luka:16:4: 4.Have! Nzi icyo nzakora kugira ngo nimara kunyagwa bazandaze mu mazu yabo.’
luka:16:5: 5.“Ahamagara ufite umwenda wa shebuja wese, abaza uwa mbere ati ‘Harya databuja akwishyuza iki?’
luka:16:6: 6.Aramusubiza ati ‘Incuro ijana z’amavuta ya elayo.’ Na we ati ‘Enda urwandiko rwawe, wicare vuba wandike mirongo itanu.’
luka:16:7: 7.Maze abaza undi ati ‘Harya wishyuzwa iki?’ Aramusubiza ati ‘Incuro ijana z’amasaka.’ Aramubwira ati ‘Enda urwandiko rwawe wandike mirongo inani.’
luka:16:8: 8.“Nuko shebuja ashima icyo gisonga kibi kuko cyakoze iby’ubwenge, kuko abana b’iyi si ari abanyabwenge mu byo ku ngoma yabo kuruta abana b’umucyo.
luka:16:9: 9.“Kandi ndababwira nti ‘Ubutunzi bubi mubushakisha incuti, kugira ngo nibushira bazabakire mu buturo bw’iteka.
luka:16:10: 10.Ukiranuka ku cyoroheje cyane, aba akiranutse no ku gikomeye. Kandi ukiranirwa ku cyoroheje cyane, aba akiraniwe no ku gikomeye.
luka:16:11: 11.Niba mutakiranutse mubikijwe ubutunzi bubi, ni nde uzababitsa ubutunzi bw’ukuri?
luka:16:12: 12.Kandi niba mutakiranutse ku by’abandi mubikijwe, ni nde uzabaha ibyo mwitegekaho?’
luka:16:13: 13.“Nta mugaragu ucyeza abami babiri, kuko aba ashaka kwanga umwe agakunda undi, cyangwa yaguma kuri umwe agasuzugura undi. Ntimubasha gukeza Imana n’ubutunzi.”
luka:16:14: 14.Abafarisayo kuko bari abakunzi b’ubutunzi, bumvise ibyo byose baramukoba cyane.
luka:16:15: 15.Arababwira ati “Mwebwe mukunda kwigira abakiranutsi imbere y’abantu ariko Imana izi imitima yanyu, kuko icyogejwe imbere y’abantu ari ikizira mu maso y’Imana.
luka:16:16: 16.“Amategeko n’abahanuzi byabayeho kugeza igihe cya Yohana, uhereye icyo gihe ni ho ubutumwa bwiza bw’ubwami bw’Imana bwigishirijwe, umuntu wese arabutwaranira.
luka:16:17: 17.Icyoroshye ni uko ijuru n’isi byashira, kuruta ko agace k’inyuguti imwe yo mu mategeko kavaho.
luka:16:18: 18.“Umuntu wese usenda umugore we akarongora undi aba asambanye, kandi n’ucyura umugore usenzwe n’umugabo we aba asambanye.
luka:16:19: Umugani w’umutunzi n’umukene19.“Hariho umutunzi wambaraga imyenda y’imihengeri n’iy’ibitare byiza, iminsi yose agahora adamaraye.
luka:16:20: 20.Kandi hariho n’umukene witwaga Lazaro, wahoraga aryamye ku muryango w’uwo mukire, umubiri we wuzuyeho ibisebe. Imbwa na zo zarazaga zikamurigata mu bisebe,
luka:16:21: 21.kandi yifuzaga guhazwa n’ubuvungukira buva ku meza y’umutunzi.
luka:16:22: 22.“Bukeye umukene arapfa, abamarayika bamujyana mu gituza cya Aburahamu, n’umutunzi na we arapfa arahambwa.
luka:16:23: 23.Ageze ikuzimu arababazwa cyane, yubuye amaso areba Aburahamu ari kure na Lazaro ari mu gituza cye.
luka:16:24: 24.Arataka ati ‘Aburahamu sogokuru, mbabarira wohereze Lazaro, akoze isonga y’urutoki rwe mu tuzi antonyangirize ku rurimi, kuko mbabazwa n’uyu muriro.’
luka:16:25: 25.“Aburahamu aramubwira ati ‘Mwana wanjye, ibuka yuko wahawe ibyiza byawe ukiriho. Lazaro na we yahawe ibibi, none aguwe neza hano naho wowe urababazwa cyane.
luka:16:26: 26.Kandi uretse n’ibyo, dore hariho umworera munini bikabije hagati yacu namwe, washyiriweho kugira ngo abashaka kuva hano kuza aho muri batabibasha, kandi n’abava aho batagera hano.’
luka:16:27: 27.Na we ati ‘Ndakwinginze sogokuru ngo nibura umwohereze kwa data,
luka:16:28: 28.kuko mfite bene data batanu, ababurire ngo na bo batazaza aha hantu ho kubabarizwa cyane.’
luka:16:29: 29.“Aburahamu aramubwira ati ‘Bafite Mose n’abahanuzi, babumvire.’
luka:16:30: 30.Na we ati ‘Oya sogokuru Aburahamu, ahubwo nihagira uzuka akabasanga bazihana.’
luka:16:31: 31.Aramubwira ati ‘Nibatumvira Mose n’abahanuzi, ntibakwemera naho umuntu yazuka.’ ”
luka:17:1: Ibisitaza abantu1.Nuko abwira abigishwa be ati “Nta cyabuza ibisitaza kuza, ariko ubizana azabona ishyano.
luka:17:2: 2.Ibyamubera byiza ni uko yahambirwa urusyo mu ijosi akarohwa mu nyanja, biruta ko yagusha umwe muri aba batoya.
luka:17:3: 3.Mwirinde! “Mwene so nakora nabi umucyahe, niyihana umubabarire.
luka:17:4: 4.Kandi nakugirira nabi ku munsi umwe, akaguhindukirira karindwi ati ‘Ndihannye’, uzamubabarire.”
luka:17:5: Ibyo kwizera5.Maze intumwa zibwira Umwami Yesu ziti “Twongerere kwizera.”
luka:17:6: 6.Umwami ati “Mwagira kwizera kungana n’akabuto ka sinapi, mwabwira uyu mukuyu muti ‘Randuka uterwe mu nyanja’, na wo wabumvira.
luka:17:7: 7.“Ariko ni nde muri mwe ufite umugaragu umuhingira cyangwa umuragirira intama, wamubwira akiva ku murimo ati ‘Igira hano vuba wicare ufungure?’
luka:17:8: 8.Ahubwo ntiyamubwira ati ‘Banza untunganirize ibyokurya byanjye, ukenyere umpereze kugeza ubwo ndangiza kurya no kunywa, maze hanyuma nawe ubone kurya’?
luka:17:9: 9.Mbese yashima uwo mugaragu kuko yakoze ibyo ategetswe?
luka:17:10: 10.Nuko namwe nimumara gukora ibyo mwategetswe byose mujye muvuga muti ‘Turi abagaragu batagira umumaro, kuko twashohoje gusa ibyo twabwiwe gukora.’ ”
luka:17:11: Yesu akiza ababembe cumi11.Nuko bari mu nzira bajya i Yerusalemu, anyura hagati y’i Samariya n’i Galilaya.
luka:17:12: 12.Akigera mu kirorero asanganirwa n’ababembe cumi, bahagarara kure
luka:17:13: 13.barataka cyane bati “Mutware Yesu, tubabarire.”
luka:17:14: 14.Ababonye arababwira ati “Nimugende mwiyereke umutambyi.” Bakigenda barakira.
luka:17:15: 15.Umwe muri bo abonye akize agaruka ahimbaza Imana n’ijwi rirenga,
luka:17:16: 16.yikubita imbere y’ibirenge bye aramushima, kandi uwo yari Umusamariya.
luka:17:17: 17.Yesu aramubaza ati “Ntimwakize muri icumi? Ba bandi cyenda bari he?
luka:17:18: 18.Nta bandi bagarutse guhimbaza Imana, keretse uyu munyamahanga?”
luka:17:19: 19.Kandi aramubwira ati “Byuka wigendere, kwizera kwawe kuragukijije.”
luka:17:20: Ibizaba mu gihe cy’imperuka (Mat 24.23-28,37-41)20.Abafarisayo baramubaza bati “Ubwami bw’Imana buzaza ryari?” Arabasubiza ati “Ubwami bw’Imana ntibuzaza ku mugaragaro,
luka:17:21: 21.kandi ntibazavuga bati ‘Dore ngubu’, cyangwa bati ‘Nguburiya’, kuko ubwami bw’Imana buri hagati muri mwe.”
luka:17:22: 22.Abwira abigishwa be ati “Hazabaho igihe muzifuza kubona umunsi umwe mu minsi y’Umwana w’umuntu, ariko ntimuzawubona.
luka:17:23: 23.Kandi bazababwira bati ‘Dore nguriya’, cyangwa bati ‘Dore nguyu.’ Ntimuzajyeyo kandi ntimuzabakurikire.
luka:17:24: 24.Nk’uko umurabyo urabiriza mu ruhande rumwe rw’ijuru, ukarabagiranira mu rundi, uko ni ko Umwana w’umuntu azaba ku munsi we.
luka:17:25: 25.Ariko akwiriye kubanza kubabazwa uburyo bwinshi, no kwangwa n’ab’iki gihe.
luka:17:26: 26.Kandi uko byari biri mu minsi ya Nowa, ni ko bizaba no mu minsi y’Umwana w’umuntu:
luka:17:27: 27.bararyaga, baranywaga, bararongoraga, barashyingiraga, bageza umunsi Nowa yinjiriye mu nkuge, umwuzure uraza urabarimbura bose.
luka:17:28: 28.No mu minsi ya Loti na yo byari bimeze bityo: bararyaga, baranywaga, baraguraga, barabibaga, barubakaga,
luka:17:29: 29.maze umunsi Loti yavuye i Sodomu, umuriro n’amazuku biva mu ijuru biragwa, birabarimbura bose.
luka:17:30: 30.Ni na ko bizamera umunsi Umwana w’umuntu azabonekeraho.
luka:17:31: 31.“Uwo munsi uzaba hejuru y’inzu, ibintu bye bikaba biri mu nzu, ye kuzamanuka kubikuramo, n’uri mu mirima ni uko ntazasubira inyuma.
luka:17:33: 33.Ushaka kurengera ubugingo bwe wese azabubura, ariko uzabura ubugingo bwe wese azaburokora.
luka:17:34: 34.Ndababwira yuko muri iryo joro, ababiri bazaba baryamye ku buriri bumwe, umwe azajyanwa undi agasigara.
luka:17:35: 35.Abagore babiri bazaba basera hamwe, umwe azajyanwa undi asigare.
luka:17:36: 36.Ababiri bazaba bari mu murima, umwe azajyanwa undi asigare.”
luka:17:37: 37.Baramubaza bati “Databuja, bizabera he?” Arababwira ati “Aho intumbi iri hose, ni ho inkongoro ziteranira.”
luka:18:1: Umugani w’umucamanza n’umupfakazi wamutitirije1.Abacira umugani wo kubigisha ko bakwiriye gusenga iteka ntibarambirwe. Arababwira ati
luka:18:2: 2.“Hariho umucamanza mu mudugudu umwe, utubaha Imana ntiyite ku bantu.
luka:18:3: 3.Muri uwo mudugudu harimo umupfakazi, aramusanga aramubwira ati ‘Ndengera ku mwanzi wanjye.’
luka:18:4: 4.Amara iminsi atemera, ariko aho ageze aribwira ati ‘Nubwo ntubaha Imana kandi sinite ku bantu,
luka:18:5: 5.ariko kuko uyu mupfakazi anduhije ndamurengera, ngo adahora aza iminsi yose akandushya.’ ”
luka:18:6: 6.Nuko Umwami Yesu arabaza ati “Ntimwumvise ibyo umucamanza ukiranirwa yavuze?
luka:18:7: 7.Ubwo bibaye bityo, Imana se yo ntizarengera intore zayo ziyitakira ku manywa na nijoro? Mbese yazirangarana?
luka:18:8: 8.Ndababwira yuko izazirengera vuba. Ariko Umwana w’umuntu naza, mbese azasanga kwizera kukiri mu isi?”
luka:18:9: Umugani w’Umufarisayo n’umukoresha w’ikoro9.Uyu mugani yawuciriye abiyiringiye ubwabo ko bakiranuka, bagahinyura abandi bose.
luka:18:10: 10.Ati “Abantu babiri bazamutse bajya mu rusengero gusenga, umwe yari Umufarisayo undi, ari umukoresha w’ikoro.
luka:18:11: 11.“Umufarisayo arahagarara, asengera mu mutima we ati ‘Mana, ndagushimiye yuko ntameze nk’abandi b’abanyazi n’abakiranirwa n’abasambanyi, cyangwa ndetse n’uyu mukoresha w’ikoro.
luka:18:12: 12.Mu minsi irindwi hose niyiriza ubusa kabiri, ntanga kimwe mu icumi mu byo nungutse byose.’
luka:18:13: 13.“Naho uwo mukoresha w’ikoro ahagarara kure, ntiyahangara no kubura amaso ngo arebe mu ijuru, ahubwo yikubita mu gituza ati ‘Mana, mbabarira kuko ndi umunyabyaha.’
luka:18:14: 14.Ndababwira yuko uwo muntu yamanutse ajya iwe, ari we utsindishirijwe kuruta wa wundi, kuko uwishyira hejuru azacishwa bugufi, ariko uwicisha bugufi azashyirwa hejuru.”
luka:18:15: Yesu yakira abana bato (Mat 19.13-15; Mar 10.13-16)15.Nuko bamuzanira abana bato ngo abakoreho, ariko abigishwa babibonye barabacyaha.
luka:18:16: 16.Maze Yesu arabahamagara ati “Mureke abana bato bansange, ntimubabuze kuko abameze batyo ubwami bw’Imana ari ubwabo.
luka:18:17: 17.Ndababwira ukuri yuko utemera ubwami bw’Imana nk’umwana muto, atazabwinjiramo na hato.”
luka:18:18: Umutware ananirwa kwinjira mu bwami bw’Imana (Mat 19.16-30; Mar 10.17-31)18.Umutware aramubaza ati “Mwigisha mwiza, nkore nte ngo mbone kuragwa ubugingo buhoraho?”
luka:18:19: 19.Yesu na we aramusubiza ati “Unyitira iki mwiza? Nta mwiza keretse umwe, ni Imana.
luka:18:20: 20.Uzi amategeko ngo ‘Ntugasambane, ntukice, ntukibe, ntukabeshyere abandi, wubahe so na nyoko.’ ”
luka:18:21: 21.Aramubwira ati “Ayo yose narayitondeye mpereye mu buto bwanjye.”
luka:18:22: 22.Yesu abyumvise aramubwira ati “Noneho ushigaje kimwe: ibyo ufite byose ubigure uhe abakene, ni bwo uzagira ubutunzi mu ijuru, uhereko uze unkurikire.”
luka:18:23: 23.Abyumvise agira agahinda kenshi, kuko yari umutunzi cyane.
luka:18:24: 24.Yesu amwitegereje aramubwira ati “Erega biraruhije ko abatunzi binjira mu bwami bw’Imana!
luka:18:25: 25.Ndetse icyoroshye ni uko ingamiya yanyura mu zuru ry’urushinge, kuruta ko umutunzi yakwinjira mu bwami bw’Imana.”
luka:18:26: 26.Ababyumvise bati “Ubwo bimeze bityo ni nde ushobora gukizwa?”
luka:18:27: 27.Arabasubiza ati “Ibidashobokera abantu bishobokera Imana.”
luka:18:28: 28.Petero aramubwira ati “Dore twebwe twasize ibyacu turagukurikira.”
luka:18:29: 29.Arababwira ati “Ndababwira ukuri yuko ari nta muntu wasize inzu ye cyangwa umugore, cyangwa bene se cyangwa ababyeyi cyangwa abana ku bw’ubwami bw’Imana,
luka:18:30: 30.utazongerwa ibirutaho cyane muri iki gihe, no mu gihe kizaza agahabwa ubugingo buhoraho.”
luka:18:31: Yesu avuga iby’urupfu rwe (Mat 20.17-19; Mar 10.31-34)31.Yesu yihererana n’abo cumi na babiri arababwira ati “Dore turazamuka tujye i Yerusalemu, kandi ibyanditswe n’abahanuzi byose bizasohora ku Mwana w’umuntu.
luka:18:32: 32.Azagambanirwa mu bapagani, azashinyagurirwa, bazamukoza isoni bamucire amacandwe,
luka:18:33: 33.kandi nibamara kumukubita imikoba bazamwica, maze ku munsi wa gatatu azazuka.”
luka:18:34: 34.Ariko ntibagira icyo bamenya muri ibyo, kuko ayo magambo bari bayahishwe, ntibamenya ibyo babwiwe.
luka:18:35: Yesu ahumura impumyi (Mat 20.29-34; Mar 10.46-52)35.Nuko yenda kugera i Yeriko, impumyi yari yicaye iruhande rw’inzira isabiriza,
luka:18:36: 36.yumvise abantu benshi bahita ibaza ibyo ari byo.
luka:18:37: 37.Barayibwira bati “Ni Yesu w’i Nazareti uhita.”
luka:18:38: 38.Irataka cyane iti “Yesu mwene Dawidi, mbabarira.”
luka:18:39: 39.Abagiye imbere barayicyaha ngo iceceke, ariko irushaho gutaka iti “Mwene Dawidi, mbabarira.”
luka:18:40: 40.Yesu arahagarara, ategeka ko bayimuzanira. Igeze bugufi arayibaza ati
luka:18:41: 41.“Urashaka ko nkugirira nte?” Iti “Databuja, ndashaka guhumuka.”
luka:18:42: 42.Yesu arayibwira ati “Humuka, kwizera kwawe kuragukijije.”
luka:18:43: 43.Ako kanya arahumuka, amukurikira ahimbaza Imana. Abantu bose babibonye bashima Imana.
luka:19:1: Ibya Zakayo1.Yesu agera i Yeriko, arahanyura.
luka:19:2: 2.Nuko hariho umuntu witwaga Zakayo, yari umukoresha w’ikoro mukuru kandi yari umutunzi.
luka:19:3: 3.Ashaka kureba Yesu ngo amenye uko asa, ariko ntiyabibasha kuko abantu bari benshi kandi ari mugufi.
luka:19:4: 4.Arirukanka ajya imbere, yurira umuvumu ngo amurebe kuko yari agiye kunyuraho.
luka:19:5: 5.Yesu ahageze arararama aramubwira ati “Zakayo, ururuka vuba kuko uyu munsi nkwiriye kurara iwawe.”
luka:19:6: 6.Yururuka vuba amwakira anezerewe.
luka:19:7: 7.Abantu bose babibonye barabyivovotera bati “Dorere, agiye gucumbika ku munyabyaha!”
luka:19:8: 8.Maze Zakayo arahaguruka abwira Umwami Yesu ati “Dore Databuja, umugabane wa kabiri w’ibintu byanjye ndawuha abakene, kandi umuntu wese nambuye ndabimuriha kane.”
luka:19:9: 9.Yesu aramubwira ati “Uyu munsi agakiza kaje muri iyi nzu, kuko na we ari umwana wa Aburahamu,
luka:19:10: 10.kandi Umwana w’umuntu yazanywe no gushaka no gukiza icyari cyazimiye.”
luka:19:11: Umugani wa mina cumi (Mat 25.14-30)11.Bumvise ibyo yongeraho umugani, kuko yari ageze hafi y’i Yerusalemu, kandi kuko bibwiraga ko ubwami bw’Imana bugiye kuboneka uwo mwanya.
luka:19:12: 12.Nuko aravuga ati “Hariho umuntu w’imfura wazindukiye mu gihugu cya kure kwimikirwayo, yamara kwima akagaruka.
luka:19:13: 13.Nuko ahamagara abagaragu be cumi, abaha mina cumi arababwira ati ‘Mube muzigenzura kugeza aho nzazira.’
luka:19:14: 14.Ariko ingabo ze zaramwangaga, zimukurikiza intumwa ziti ‘Uyu ntidushaka ko adutegeka.’
luka:19:15: 15.“Agarutse amaze kwimikwa, ategeka ko bahamagara ba bagaragu yasigiye za feza, ngo amenye urugenzo umuntu wese muri bo yagenzuye.
luka:19:16: 16.Uwa mbere araza ati ‘Mwami, mina yawe yavuyemo izindi mina cumi.’
luka:19:17: 17.Aramubwira ati ‘Nuko nuko mugaragu mwiza, kuko wakiranutse ku gito cyane, nuko ube umutware w’imisozi cumi.’
luka:19:18: 18.Haza uwa kabiri ati ‘Mwami, mina yawe yavuyemo mina eshanu.’
luka:19:19: 19.Uwo na we aramubwira ati ‘Nawe, twara imisozi itanu.’
luka:19:20: 20.“Undi araza aramubwira ati ‘Mwami, dore mina yawe! Narayibitse ipfunyitse mu gitambaro,
luka:19:21: 21.kuko nagutinyiye ko uri umunyamwaga, ujyana ibyo utabitse, ugasarura ibyo utabibye.’
luka:19:22: 22.Aramubwira ati ‘Ndagucira urubanza ku byo uvuze, wa mugaragu mubi we. Wari uzi yuko ndi umunyamwaga, ko njyana ibyo ntabitse, ko nsarura ibyo ntabibye.
luka:19:23: 23.Ni iki cyakubujije guha abagenza ifeza yanjye, ngo bayigenzure, maze naza nkayitwarana n’urugenzo rwayo?’
luka:19:24: 24.“Abwira abahagaze aho ati ‘Nimumwake mina ye muyihe ufite mina cumi.’
luka:19:25: 25.Baramubwira bati ‘Mwami, ko afite icumi!’
luka:19:26: 26.‘Ndababwira yuko ufite azahabwa, ariko udafite azakwa n’icyo yari afite.
luka:19:27: 27.Kandi ba banzi banjye batakunze ko mbategeka, nimubazane hano mubicire imbere yanjye.’ ”
luka:19:28: 28.Amaze kuvuga ibyo ajya imbere, azamuka i Yerusalemu.
luka:19:29: Yesu ajya i Yerusalemu ahetswe n’indogobe (Mat 21.1-11; Mar 11.1-11; Yoh 12.12-19)29.Ageze bugufi bw’i Betifage n’i Betaniya ku musozi witwa Elayono, atuma babiri bo mu bigishwa be ati
luka:19:30: 30.“Mujye mu kirorero kiri imbere yanyu, nimwinjiramo muri bubone icyana cy’indogobe kiziritse, kitigeze guheka umuntu. Nuko mukiziture mukizane.
luka:19:31: 31.Kandi nihagira umuntu ubabaza ati ‘Murakiziturira iki?’ Mumubwire mutya muti ‘Databuja ni we ugishaka.’ ”
luka:19:32: 32.Izo ntumwa ziragenda zibisanga nk’uko yazibwiye.
luka:19:33: 33.Bakizitura icyana cy’indogobe, ba nyiracyo barababaza bati “Murakiziturira iki?”
luka:19:34: 34.Barabasubiza bati “Databuja ni we ugishaka.”
luka:19:35: 35.Bakizanira Yesu, bagiteguraho imyenda yabo bacyicazaho Yesu.
luka:19:36: 36.Akigenda basasa imyenda yabo mu nzira.
luka:19:37: 37.Yenda kugera mu ibanga rw’umusozi wa Elayono, iteraniro rinini ry’abigishwa be bose batangira kunezerwa, no guhimbarisha Imana ijwi rirenga ku bw’ibitangaza babonye byose bati
luka:19:38: 38.“Hahirwa Umwami uje mu izina ry’Uwiteka, Amahoro abe mu ijuru, N’icyubahiro kibe ahasumba hose.”
luka:19:39: 39.Abafarisayo bari muri iryo teraniro baramubwira bati “Mwigisha, cyaha abigishwa bawe.”
luka:19:40: 40.Arabasubiza ati “Ndababwira yuko aba bahoze, amabuye yarangurura.”
luka:19:41: Yesu aririra Yerusalemu41.Ageze hafi abona umurwa arawuririra ati
luka:19:42: 42.“Uyu munsi nawe, iyo umenya ibyaguhesha amahoro! Ariko noneho bihishwe amaso yawe.
luka:19:43: 43.Kuko iminsi izaza, ubwo abanzi bawe bazakubakaho uruzitiro. Bazakugota, bazakurinda cyane impande zose,
luka:19:44: 44.kandi bazagutsembana n’abana bawe batuye muri wowe. Ntibazagusigira ibuye rigeretse ku rindi, kuko utamenye igihe wagenderewe.”
luka:19:45: Yirukana abaguriraga mu rusengero (Mat 21.12-17; Mar 11.15-19; Yoh 2.13-22)45.Yinjira mu rusengero atangira kwirukana abaguriragamo,
luka:19:46: 46.arababwira ati “Handitswe ngo ‘Inzu yanjye izaba inzu yo gusengerwamo’, ariko mwebwe mwayihinduye isenga y’abambuzi.”
luka:19:47: 47.Nuko yigishiriza mu rusengero iminsi yose, ariko abatambyi bakuru n’abanditsi n’abakuru b’ubwo bwoko bashaka kumwica,
luka:19:48: 48.icyakora babura uko babikora kuko abantu bose bari bitaye ku magambo ye.
luka:20:1: Abatambyi bakuru babaza Yesu aho yakuye ubutware bwe (Mat 21.23-27; Mar 11.27-33)1.Nuko ku munsi umwe muri iyo, yigishirizaga abantu mu rusengero avuga ubutumwa bwiza, abatambyi bakuru n’abanditsi hamwe n’abakuru bajya aho ari.
luka:20:2: 2.Baramubwira bati “Tubwire. Ni butware ki bugutera gukora ibi? Cyangwa se ni nde wabuguhaye?”
luka:20:3: 3.Arabasubiza ati “Nanjye reka mbabaze ijambo mumbwire.
luka:20:4: 4.Kubatiza kwa Yohana kwavuye he? Ni mu ijuru cyangwa mu bantu?”
luka:20:5: 5.Biburanya mu mitima yabo bati “Nituvuga tuti ‘Kwavuye mu ijuru’, aratubaza ati ‘Ni iki cyababujije kumwemera?’
luka:20:6: 6.Kandi nituvuga tuti ‘Kwavuye mu bantu’, abantu bose baradutera amabuye kuko bemera ko Yohana yari umuhanuzi.”
luka:20:7: 7.Nuko bamusubiza yuko batazi aho kwavuye.
luka:20:8: 8.Yesu arababwira ati “Nuko rero nanjye simbabwira ubutware buntera gukora ibyo ubwo ari bwo.”
luka:20:9: Umugani w’abahinzi b’abagome (Mat 21.33-46; Mar 12.1-12)9.Atangira gucira abantu uyu mugani ati “Hariho umuntu wateye uruzabibu, asigamo abahinzi ajya mu kindi gihugu, atindayo.
luka:20:10: 10.Igihe cyo gusarura imyaka gisohoye, atuma umugaragu kuri ba bahinzi ngo bamuhe ku mbuto z’imizabibu, ariko abahinzi baramukubita, baramwirukana agenda ubusa.
luka:20:11: 11.Yongera gutuma undi mugaragu na we baramukubita, baramuhemura agenda amara masa.
luka:20:12: 12.Yongera gutuma n’uwa gatatu, uwo baramukomeretsa, baramwirukana.
luka:20:13: 13.Nyir’uruzabibu aravuga ati ‘Noneho mbigenze nte? Reka ntume umwana wanjye nkunda, ahari none we bazamwubaha.’
luka:20:14: 14.Ariko ba bahinzi bamubonye bajya inama bati ‘Uyu ni we mutware. Nimucyo tumwice ubutware bube ubwacu.’
luka:20:15: 15.Bamwirukana mu ruzabibu, baramwica. “Mbese nyir’uruzabibu nabimenya azabagenza ate?
luka:20:16: 16.Azaza arimbure abo bahinzi, uruzabibu aruhe abandi.” Abantu babyumvise baravuga bati “Biragatsindwa.”
luka:20:17: 17.Arabitegereza arababwira ati “None se ibi byanditswe ni ibiki ngo ‘Ibuye abubatsi banze, Ni ryo ryahindutse irikomeza imfuruka?’
luka:20:18: 18.Uzagwira iryo buye wese azavunagurika, ariko uwo rizagwira rizamugira ifu.”
luka:20:19: Abafarisayo bamugerageresha iby’umusoro (Mat 22.15-22; Mar 12.15-17)19.Uwo mwanya abanditsi n’abatambyi bakuru bashaka kumufata, kuko bamenye yuko ari bo yaciriyeho uwo mugani, ariko batinya rubanda.
luka:20:20: 20.Baramugenza, batuma abatasi bigize nk’abakiranutsi ngo bakure impamvu mu byo avuga, bahereko babone uko bamushyira Umutegeka, na we amucire urubanza.
luka:20:21: 21.Baramubaza bati “Mwigisha, tuzi yuko uvuga neza, kandi ukigisha ibitunganye ntiwite ku cyubahiro cy’abantu, ahubwo wigisha inzira y’Imana by’ukuri.
luka:20:22: 22.Mbese amategeko yemera ko duha Kayisari umusoro, cyangwa ntiyemera?”
luka:20:23: 23.Ariko amenye uburiganya bwabo arababwira ati
luka:20:24: 24.“Nimunyereke idenariyo.” Ati “Ishusho n’izina biyiriho ni ibya nde?” Baramusubiza bati “Ni ibya Kayisari.”
luka:20:25: 25.Arababwira ati “Nuko rero ibya Kayisari mubihe Kayisari, iby’Imana mubihe Imana.”
luka:20:26: 26.Muri ayo magambo ashubirije imbere y’abantu ntibashobora kubona ijambo na rimwe ryatuma bamurega, batangarira ibyo abashubije baraceceka.
luka:20:27: Yesu asubiza Abasadukayo ibyo kuzuka (Mat 22.23-33; Mar 12.18-27)27.Abasadukayo bamwe bahakanaga yuko ari nta wuzuka, baza aho ari baramubaza bati
luka:20:28: 28.“Mwigisha, Mose yatwandikiye yuko mwene se w’umuntu napfa afite umugore batarabyarana, mwene se azahungure uwo mugore acikure mwene se.
luka:20:29: 29.Nuko habayeho abavandimwe barindwi: uwa mbere arongora umugeni apfa batarabyarana,
luka:20:30: 30.n’uwa kabiri ni uko,
luka:20:31: 31.n’uwa gatatu aramuhungura, nuko bose uko ari barindwi bapfa batyo badasize abana.
luka:20:32: 32.Hanyuma wa mugore na we arapfa.
luka:20:33: 33.None se mu izuka azaba ari muka nde muri bose, ko bose uko ari barindwi bamugize umugore?”
luka:20:34: 34.Yesu arabasubiza ati “Abana b’iyi si bararongora, bagashyingirwa,
luka:20:35: 35.ariko abemerewe kuzagera muri ya si yindi, bakaba bakwiriye no kugera ku kuzuka mu bapfuye, ntibazarongora kandi ntibazashyingirwa,
luka:20:36: 36.kandi ntibazaba bagishobora gupfa kuko bazamera nk’abamarayika, bakaba ari abana b’Imana kuko ari abana b’umuzuko.
luka:20:37: 37.Ariko ibyemeza yuko abapfuye bazuka, Mose na we yabigaragarije ku byabereye kuri cya Gihuru, ubwo yitaga Uwiteka Imana ya Aburahamu n’Imana ya Isaka n’Imana ya Yakobo.
luka:20:38: 38.Nuko rero Imana si Imana y’abapfuye, ahubwo ni iy’abazima kuko bose kuri yo ari bazima.”
luka:20:39: 39.Bamwe mu banditsi baramusubiza bati “Mwigisha, uvuze neza.”
luka:20:40: 40.Ntibaba bagitinyuka kumubaza irindi jambo.
luka:20:41: Umwana wa Dawidi (Mat 22.41-46; Mar 12.35-37)41.Arababaza ati “Bavuga bate yuko Kristo ari mwene Dawidi,
luka:20:42: 42.ko Dawidi ubwe avuga mu gitabo cya Zaburi ati ‘Uwiteka yabwiye Umwami wanjye ati: Icara iburyo bwanjye,
luka:20:43: 43.Ugeze aho nzashyira abanzi bawe munsi y’ibirenge byawe?’
luka:20:44: 44.Mbese ko Dawidi amwita Umwami, none yabasha ate no kuba umwana we?”
luka:20:45: Yesu ababwira kwirinda abanditsi(Mat 23.1-36; Mar 12.38-40)45.Nuko abwira abigishwa be abantu bose bumva ati
luka:20:46: 46.“Mwirinde abanditsi bakunda kugenda bambaye ibishura, bagakunda kuramukirizwa mu maguriro, no kwicara ku ntebe z’icyubahiro mu masinagogi no mu myanya y’abakuru, bari mu birori.
luka:20:47: 47.Barya ingo z’abapfakazi, kandi bakavuga amashengesho y’urudaca baryarya. Abo bazacirwaho iteka rirusha ayandi kuba ribi.”
luka:21:1: Umupfakazi wari umukene (Mar 12.41-44)1.Nuko yubura amaso abona abatunzi batura amaturo yabo, bayashyira mu isanduku y’amaturo.
luka:21:2: 2.Abona umupfakazi wari umukene atura amasenga abiri.
luka:21:3: 3.Arababwira ati “Ndababwira ukuri, yuko uriya mupfakazi atuye byinshi kuruta iby’abandi bose,
luka:21:4: 4.kuko bose batuye amaturo y’ibibasagutse, ariko we mu bukene bwe atuye ibyo yari atezeho amakiriro.”
luka:21:5: Kurimbuka kwa Yerusalemu no kugaruka kwa Yesu (Mat 24.1-14; Mar 13.1-13)5.Nuko bamwe bavuga iby’urusengero, uko rwarimbishijwe n’amabuye meza n’amaturo. Arababwira ati
luka:21:6: 6.“Ibyo mureba ibi, mu minsi izaza ntihazasigara ibuye rigeretse ku rindi ritajugunywe hasi.”
luka:21:7: 7.Baramubaza bati “Mwigisha, ibyo bizabaho ryari? N’ikimenyetso kigaragaza ko igihe bizasohorezwamo cyegereje ni ikihe?”
luka:21:8: 8.Arabasubiza ati “Mwirinde batabayobya, kuko benshi bazaza biyita izina ryanjye bati ‘Ni jye Kristo’, kandi bati ‘Igihe kiri bugufi’, ariko ntimuzabakurikire.
luka:21:9: 9.Ariko nimwumva intambara n’imidugararo ntimuzahagarike imitima, kuko ibyo bikwiriye kubanza kubaho, ariko imperuka ntizaherako isohora uwo mwanya.”
luka:21:10: 10.Arongera arababwira ati “Ishyanga rizatera irindi shyanga, n’ubwami butere ubundi bwami.
luka:21:11: 11.Kandi mu isi hamwe na hamwe hazaba ibishyitsi bikomeye, kandi hazabaho inzara n’ibyorezo by’indwara. Hazabaho n’ibitera ubwoba, n’ibimenyetso bikomeye biva mu ijuru.
luka:21:12: 12.Ariko ibyo byose bitaraza bazabafata babarenganye, babajyane mu masinagogi no mu mazu y’imbohe, babashyire abami n’abategeka babahora izina ryanjye,
luka:21:13: 13.ibyo bizababeraho kugira ngo mube abahamya.
luka:21:14: 14.Nuko mumaramaze mu mitima yanyu, yuko mutazashaka ibyo mwireguza icyo gihe kitaragera,
luka:21:15: 15.kuko nzabaha ururimi n’ubwenge, ibyo abanzi banyu bose batazabasha kuvuguruza cyangwa gutsinda.
luka:21:16: 16.Ariko muzagambanirwa n’ababyeyi banyu, ndetse n’abavandimwe na bene wanyu n’incuti zanyu, bazicisha bamwe muri mwe.
luka:21:17: 17.Muzangwa na bose babahora izina ryanjye,
luka:21:18: 18.ariko ntimuzapfuka agasatsi na kamwe ku mitwe yanyu.
luka:21:19: 19.Nimwihangana muzakiza ubugingo bwanyu.
luka:21:20: Kurimbuka kwa Yerusalemu (Mat 24.15-34; Mar 13.14-31)20.“Ariko ubwo muzabona i Yerusalemu hagoswe n’ingabo, muzamenye yuko kurimbuka kwaho kwenda gusohora.
luka:21:21: 21.Icyo gihe abazaba bari i Yudaya bazahungire ku misozi miremire, n’abazaba bari hagati muri Yerusalemu bazayivemo, n’abazaba bari imusozi ntibazayijyemo,
luka:21:22: 22.kuko iyo minsi izaba ari iyo guhoreramo ngo ibyanditswe byose bisohore.
luka:21:23: 23.Abazaba batwite n’abonsa muri iyo minsi bazabona ishyano, kuko hazaba kubabara kwinshi mu gihugu, kandi umujinya uzaba uri kuri ubu bwoko.
luka:21:24: 24.Bamwe bazicwa n’inkota, abandi bajyanwe mu mahanga yose ari imbohe, kandi i Yerusalemu hazasiribangwa n’abanyamahanga, kugeza ubwo ibihe by’abanyamahanga bizashirira.
luka:21:25: 25.“Kandi hazaba ibimenyetso ku zuba no ku kwezi no ku nyenyeri, kandi no hasi amahanga azababara, bumirwe bumvise inyanja n’umuraba bihorera.
luka:21:26: 26.Abantu bazagushwa igihumura n’ubwoba no kwibwira ibyenda kuba mu isi, kuko imbaraga zo mu ijuru zizanyeganyega.
luka:21:27: 27.Ubwo ni bwo bazabona Umwana w’umuntu aje mu gicu, afite imbaraga n’ubwiza bwinshi.
luka:21:28: 28.Nuko ibyo nibitangira kubaho muzararame, mwubure imitwe yanyu, kuko gucungurwa kwanyu kuzaba kwenda gusohora.”
luka:21:29: 29.Kandi abacira umugani ati “Nimwitegereze umutini n’ibindi biti byose.
luka:21:30: 30.Iyo bimaze gutoha, murabireba mukamenya ubwanyu ko igihe cy’impeshyi kiri bugufi.
luka:21:31: 31.Nuko namwe nimubona ibyo bibaye, muzamenye yuko ubwami bw’Imana buri hafi.
luka:21:32: 32.“Ndababwira ukuri yuko ab’ubu bwoko batazashira na hato, kugeza aho byose bizasohorera.
luka:21:33: 33.Ijuru n’isi bizashira, ariko amagambo yanjye ntazashira na hato.
luka:21:34: 34.“Ariko mwirinde, imitima yanyu ye kuremererwa n’ivutu no gusinda n’amaganya y’iyi si, uwo munsi ukazabatungura,
luka:21:35: 35.kuko uzatungura abantu bose bari mu isi yose, umeze nk’umutego.
luka:21:36: 36.Nuko rero mujye muba maso, musenge iminsi yose kugira ngo mubone kurokoka ibyo byose byenda kubaho, no guhagarara imbere y’Umwana w’umuntu.”
luka:21:37: 37.Iminsi yose yirirwaga mu rusengero yigisha, ariko bwakwira agasohoka akarara ku musozi witwa Elayono.
luka:21:38: 38.Abantu bose bakazinduka mu gitondo, bakajya aho ari mu rusengero kumwumva.
luka:22:1: Yuda agambanira Yesu (Mat 26.2-5,14-16; Mar 14.1-2,10-11; Yoh 11.45-53)1.Nuko iminsi mikuru y’imitsima idasembuwe yitwa Pasika, yendaga gusohora.
luka:22:2: 2.Abatambyi bakuru n’abanditsi bashaka uko bamwica, kuko batinyaga rubanda.
luka:22:3: 3.Satani yinjira muri Yuda witwaga Isikariyota, yari mu mubare w’abo cumi na babiri.
luka:22:4: 4.Aragenda avugana n’abatambyi bakuru n’abatware b’abasirikare, uko azamubagenzereza.
luka:22:5: 5.Baranezerwa basezerana kumuha ifeza.
luka:22:6: 6.Aremera maze ashaka uburyo yamubagenzereza, rubanda rudahari.
luka:22:7: Yesu n’abigishwa basangira ibya Pasika (Mat 26.17-30; Mar 14.12-26; Yoh 13.21-30; 1 Kor 11.23-25)7.Nuko umunsi w’imitsima idasembuwe urasohora, ari wo ukwiriye kubagirwamo umwana w’intama wa Pasika.
luka:22:8: 8.Atuma Petero na Yohana ati “Nimugende mudutunganirize ibya Pasika kugira ngo turye.”
luka:22:9: 9.Baramubaza bati “Urashaka ko tubitunganiriza hehe?”
luka:22:10: 10.Arabasubiza ati “Dore nimumara kugera mu murwa, muraza guhura n’umugabo wikoreye ikibindi cy’amazi, mumukurikire mu nzu ari bwinjiremo.
luka:22:11: 11.Nuko mubwire nyir’inzu muti ‘Umwigisha arakubaza ngo: Icumbi riri hehe, aho ari busangirire ibya Pasika n’abigishwa be?’
luka:22:12: 12.Na we ari bubereke icyumba kinini cyo hejuru giteguye, abe ari ho mubitunganiriza.”
luka:22:13: 13.Baragenda babisanga uko yabibabwiye, batunganya ibya Pasika.
luka:22:14: 14.Igihe gisohoye aricara ngo afungure, kandi intumwa na zo zicarana na we.
luka:22:15: 15.Arazibwira ati “Kwifuza nifujije gusangira namwe Pasika iyi, ntarababazwa.
luka:22:16: 16.Ndababwira yuko ntazongera rwose kuyirya, kugeza aho izasohorera mu bwami bw’Imana.”
luka:22:17: 17.Yenda igikombe aragishimira, arababwira ati “Mwende iki musangire.
luka:22:18: 18.Ndababwira yuko uhereye none ntazanywa ku mbuto z’imizabibu, ukageza aho ubwami bw’Imana buzazira.”
luka:22:19: 19.Yenda umutsima arawushimira, arawumanyagura arawubaha, arababwira ati “Uyu ni umubiri wanjye [ubatangiwe. Mujye mukorera mutya kugira ngo munyibuke.”
luka:22:20: 20.N’igikombe akigenza atyo bamaze kurya ati “Iki gikombe ni isezerano rishya ryo mu maraso yanjye ava ku bwanyu.]
luka:22:21: 21.“Ariko dore ukuboko k’ungambanira kuri kumwe n’ukwanjye ku meza.
luka:22:22: 22.Kuko Umwana w’umuntu agenda nk’uko byamugenewe, ariko uwo muntu umugambanira azabona ishyano!”
luka:22:23: 23.Batangira kubazanya muri bo, uwenda kugira atyo uwo ari we.
luka:22:24: Abigishwa bajya impaka z’ubukuru (Mat 20.25-28)24.Maze habyuka impaka muri bo, ngo ni nde muri bo ukwiriye gutekerezwa ko ari we mukuru.
luka:22:25: 25.Arababwira ati “Abami b’amahanga barayategeka, n’abafite ubutware bwo kuyatwara bitwa ba ruhekerababyeyi.
luka:22:26: 26.Ariko mwebweho ntimukabe mutyo, ahubwo ukomeye muri mwe abe nk’uworoheje, n’utwara abe nk’uhereza.
luka:22:27: 27.Umukuru ni uwuhe? Ni uherezwa cyangwa ni uhereza? Si uherezwa? Ariko jyewe ndi hagati yanyu meze nk’uhereza.
luka:22:28: 28.“Ni mwe mwagumanye nanjye, twihanganana mu byo nageragejwe.
luka:22:29: 29.Nanjye mbabikiye ubwami nk’uko Data yabumbikiye,
luka:22:30: 30.kugira ngo muzarye munywe mwegereye ameza yanjye mu bwami bwanjye. Kandi muzicara ku ntebe z’icyubahiro, mucire imanza imiryango cumi n’ibiri y’Abisirayeli.”
luka:22:31: Yesu avuga ko Petero agiye kumwihakana (Mat 26.33-35; Mar 14.27-31; Yoh 13.36-38)31.Kandi Umwami Yesu aravuga ati “Simoni, Simoni, dore Satani yabasabye kugira ngo abagosore nk’amasaka,
luka:22:32: 32.ariko weho ndakwingingiye ngo kwizera kwawe kudacogora. Nawe numara guhinduka ukomeze bagenzi bawe.”
luka:22:33: 33.Aramubwira ati “Mwami, niteguye kujyana nawe mu nzu y’imbohe ndetse no mu rupfu.”
luka:22:34: 34.Aramubwira ati “Petero, ndakubwira yuko uyu munsi inkoko itaza kubika, utaranyihakana gatatu ko utanzi.”
luka:22:35: 35.Kandi arababaza ati “Ubwo nabatumaga mudafite impago, cyangwa imvumba cyangwa inkweto, mbese hari icyo mwakennye?” Baramusubiza bati “Nta cyo.”
luka:22:36: 36.Arababwira ati “Ariko nonaha ufite uruhago rurimo ifeza arujyane, n’ufite imvumba ni uko. Ariko utabifite agure umwitero we, ngo abone kugura inkota.
luka:22:37: 37.Ndababwira yuko ibi byanditswe bikwiriye kunsohoraho, ngo ‘Yabaranywe n’abagome’, kuko ibyanjye byenda gusohora.”
luka:22:38: 38.Baramubwira bati “Mwami, dore inkota ebyiri ngizi.” Arababwira ati “Ziramaze!”
luka:22:39: Yesu asengana umubabaro (Mat 26.36-46; Mar 14.32-42)39.Arasohoka ajya ku musozi wa Elayono nk’uko yamenyerey, abigishwa be baramukurikira.
luka:22:40: 40.Agezeyo arababwira ati “Nimusenge kugira ngo mutajya mu moshya.”
luka:22:41: 41.Atandukana na bo umwanya ureshya n’ahaterwa ibuye, arapfukama arasenga ati
luka:22:42: 42.“Data, nubishaka undenze iki gikombe, ariko bye kuba uko nshaka, ahubwo bibe uko ushaka.”
luka:22:43: 43.Marayika uvuye mu ijuru aramubonekera, amwongera imbaraga
luka:22:44: 44.kuko yari ababaye bikabije, asenga cyane, n’ibyuya bye byari bimeze nk’ibitonyanga by’amaraso bitonyanga hasi.]
luka:22:45: 45.Amaze gusenga arahaguruka ajya ku bigishwa be, asanga basinjirijwe n’agahinda.
luka:22:46: 46.Arababaza ati “Ikibasinjirije ni iki? Nimubyuke musenge kugira ngo mutajya mu moshya.”
luka:22:47: Bafata Yesu (Mat 26.47-56; Mar 14.43-50; Yoh 18.3-11)47.Akibivuga haza igitero kizanywe n’uwitwa Yuda, umwe muri abo cumi na babiri akigiye imbere. Nuko Yuda uwo yegera Yesu ngo amusome.
luka:22:48: 48.Yesu aramubaza ati “Yuda, uragambanishiriza Umwana w’umuntu kumusoma?”
luka:22:49: 49.Abari kumwe na we babonye ibyenda kubaho baramubaza bati “Databuja, tubakubite inkota?”
luka:22:50: 50.Umwe muri bo ayikubita umugaragu w’Umutambyi mukuru, amuca ugutwi kw’iburyo.
luka:22:51: 51.Yesu aravuga ati “Rekera aho.” Amukora ku gutwi aragukiza.
luka:22:52: 52.Yesu abwira abatambyi bakuru n’abatware b’abasirikare barinda urusengero, n’abakuru bamuteye ati “Munteye nk’abateye umwambuzi, mufite inkota n’inshyimbo.
luka:22:53: 53.Nahoranaga namwe mu rusengero iminsi yose, ko mutarambuye amaboko ngo mumfate? Ariko noneho iki ni igihe cyanyu n’icy’ubutware bw’umwijima.”
luka:22:54: Petero yihakana Yesu (Mat 26.69-75; Mar 14.66-72; Yoh 18.25-27)54.Baramufata baramujyana, bamushyira mu nzu y’Umutambyi mukuru, ariko Petero amukurikira arenga ahinguka.
luka:22:55: 55.Nuko bamaze gucana umuriro mu rugo hagati baricara, Petero na we yicara hagati yabo.
luka:22:56: 56.Umuja amubonye yicaye ahabona aramwitegereza aravuga ati “N’uyu na we yari kumwe na we.”
luka:22:58: 58.Hashize umwanya muto, undi aramubona aramubwira ati “Nawe uri uwo muri bo.” Petero ati “Wa muntu we, si ndi uwabo.”
luka:22:59: 59.Hashize umwanya nk’isaha imwe, undi amuhamiriza abikomeje cyane ati “Ni ukuri n’uyu yari kumwe na we, kuko ari Umunyagalilaya.”
luka:22:60: 60.Petero ati “Wa muntu we, icyo uvuze sinzi icyo ari cyo.” Akibivuga, muri ako kanya inkoko irabika.
luka:22:61: 61.Umwami Yesu arakebuka yitegereza Petero, nuko Petero yibuka amagambo Umwami yari yamubwiye ati “Uyu munsi inkoko itarabika, uri bunyihakane gatatu.”
luka:22:62: 62.Arasohoka ajya hanze ararira cyane.
luka:22:63: Bashinyagurira Yesu (Mat 26.57-68; Mar 14.55-65; Yoh 18.19-24)63.Abagabo bari bafashe Yesu baramushinyagurira, baramukubita,
luka:22:64: 64.bamupfuka mu maso baramubaza bati “Hanura, ni nde ugukubise?”
luka:22:65: 65.Bamubwira n’ibindi byinshi bamutuka.
luka:22:66: 66.Nuko iryo joro rikeye abakuru b’ubwo bwoko baraterana, ari bo batambyi bakuru n’abanditsi, bamujyana mu rukiko rwabo bati
luka:22:67: 67.“Niba uri Kristo, tubwire.” Arababwira ati “Nubwo nababwira ntimwabyemera na hato,
luka:22:68: 68.naho nababaza ntimwansubiza.
luka:22:69: 69.Ariko uhereye none, Umwana w’umuntu azaba yicaye iburyo bw’ubushobozi bw’Imana.”
luka:22:70: 70.Bose bati “Noneho uri Umwana w’Imana?” Arabasubiza ati “Mwakabimenye ko ndi we.”
luka:22:71: 71.Na bo bati “Turacyashakira iki abagabo, ko twumvise ubwacu abyivugiye ubwe?”
luka:23:1: Yesu ashyikirizwa Pilato (Mat 27.1-2,11-31; Mar 15.1-5; Yoh 18.28-40)1.Bose barahaguruka bamujyana kwa Pilato.
luka:23:2: 2.Batangira kumurega bati “Uyu twamubonye agandisha ubwoko bwacu, ababuza guha Kayisari umusoro, avuga kandi ko ari Kristo Umwami.”
luka:23:3: 3.Pilato aramubaza ati “Ni wowe mwami w’Abayuda?” Aramusubiza ati “Wakabimenye.”
luka:23:4: 4.Pilato abwira abatambyi bakuru na rubanda ati “Nta cyaha mbonye kuri uyu muntu.”
luka:23:5: 5.Na bo barashega bati “Agomesha abantu, yigisha i Yudaya hose uhereye i Galilaya ukageza n’ino.”
luka:23:6: Pilato yohereza Yesu kwa Herode6.Pilato abyumvise abaza ko ari Umunyagalilaya.
luka:23:7: 7.Amenye ko ari uwo mu gihugu cya Herode, amwohereza kwa Herode kuko na we yari i Yerusalemu muri iyo minsi.
luka:23:8: 8.Herode abonye Yesu aranezerwa cyane, kuko uhereye kera yashakaga kumubona, kuko yumvaga inkuru ze kandi yifuzaga kubona ikimenyetso yakora.
luka:23:9: 9.Amubaza amagambo menshi, ariko ntiyagira icyo amusubiza.
luka:23:10: 10.Abatambyi bakuru n’abanditsi barahagarara, bakomeza kumurega cyane.
luka:23:11: 11.Herode n’abasirikare be baramunegura, baramushinyagurira, maze bamwambika umwenda ubengerana bamugarurira Pilato.
luka:23:12: 12.Herode na Pilato baherako buzura uwo munsi, kuko mbere banganaga.
luka:23:13: Pilato acira Yesu urubanza (Mat 27.15-26; Mar 15.6-15; Yoh 18.39--19.16)13.Pilato ateranya abatambyi bakuru n’abatware n’abantu bose,
luka:23:14: 14.arababwira ati “Mwanzaniye uyu muntu ngo yagandishije abantu, none dore ubwanjye namubarije imbere yanyu, nyamara nta cyaha mbonye kuri we mu byo mwamureze.
luka:23:15: 15.Ndetse Herode na we nta cyo yabonye kuko yamutugaruriye, kandi dore nta cyo yakoze gikwiriye kumwicisha.
luka:23:16: 16.Nuko nimara kumukubita, ndamubohora.”
luka:23:17: 17.Ibyo yabivugiye kuko yabaga akwiriye kubabohorera imbohe imwe, mu minsi mikuru yose.
luka:23:18: 18.Ariko bose basakuriza icyarimwe bati “Kuraho uyu, utubohorere Baraba.”
luka:23:19: 19.Uwo bari bamushyize mu nzu y’imbohe, bamuhora ubugome n’ubwicanyi bwari mu murwa.
luka:23:20: 20.Pilato yongera kuvugana na bo, ashaka kubohora Yesu.
luka:23:21: 21.Ariko bo barasakuza bati “Mubambe! Mubambe!”
luka:23:22: 22.Ababaza ubwa gatatu ati “Kuki? Uyu yakoze cyaha ki? Simubonyeho icyaha cyo kumwicisha. Nuko nimara kumukubita, ndamubohora.”
luka:23:23: 23.Ariko baramukoranira basakuza n’amajwi arenga, bamuhata ko Yesu abambwa, amajwi yabo aramuganza.
luka:23:24: 24.Nuko Pilato aca urubanza ngo icyo bashaka bagihabwe:
luka:23:25: 25.abohora uwashyizwe mu nzu y’imbohe bamuhora ubugome n’ubwicanyi, uwo bashakaga, maze atanga Yesu ngo bamugire uko bashaka.
luka:23:26: Abagore b’i Yerusalemu baborogera Yesu26.Baramujyana, batangira umuntu witwaga Simoni w’Umunyakurene waturukaga imusozi, bamukorera umusaraba ngo awikorere akurikiye Yesu.
luka:23:27: 27.Abantu benshi baramukurikira, barimo n’abagore bikubita mu bituza bamuborogera.
luka:23:28: 28.Yesu arabakebuka arababwira ati “Bakobwa b’i Yerusalemu, ntimundirire, ahubwo mwiririre n’abana banyu,
luka:23:29: 29.kuko iminsi izaza bazavuga bati ‘Hahirwa ingumba n’inda zitabyaye, n’amabere atonkeje.’
luka:23:30: 30.Ni bwo bazatangira kubwira imisozi bati ‘Nimutugwire’, babwire n’udusozi bati ‘Nimudutwikire.’
luka:23:31: 31.Mbese ubwo bagenje batya igiti kikiri kibisi, nikimara kuma bizacura iki?”
luka:23:32: 32.Kandi bajyana n’abandi babiri bari inkozi z’ibibi, ngo babicane na we.
luka:23:33: Babamba Yesu bamushinyagurira (Mat 27.32-44; Mar 15.20-32; Yoh 19.16-24)33.Nuko bageze ahitwa i Nyabihanga, bamubambanaho n’abo bagome, umwe iburyo bwe n’undi ibumoso.
luka:23:34: 34.Yesu aravuga ati “Data, ubababarire kuko batazi icyo bakora.” Bagabana imyenda ye barayifindira.
luka:23:35: 35.Abantu barahagarara bareba. Abatware na bo baramukoba cyane bati “Yakijije abandi, ngaho na we niyikize niba ari we Kristo watoranijwe n’Imana.”
luka:23:36: 36.Abasirikare na bo baramushinyagurira, bamwegereye bamuha inzoga isharira
luka:23:37: 37.bati “Niba uri umwami w’Abayuda ikize.”
luka:23:38: 38.Hejuru ye hari urwandiko rwanditswe ngo “UYU NI UMWAMI W’ABAYUDA.”
luka:23:39: Umugome umwe yihana39.Umwe muri abo bagome babambwe aramutuka ati “Si wowe Kristo? Ngaho ikize natwe udukize.”
luka:23:40: 40.Ariko uwa kabiri amusubiza amucyaha ati “No kubaha Imana ntuyubaha, uri mu rubanza rumwe n’urwe?
luka:23:41: 41.Twebweho duhowe ukuri, tukaba twituwe ibihwanye n’ibyo twakoze, ariko uyu nta kibi yakoze.”
luka:23:42: 42.Nuko abwira Yesu ati “Mwami, uzanyibuke ubwo uzazira mu bwami bwawe.”
luka:23:43: 43.Aramusubiza ati “Ndakubwira ukuri, yuko uyu munsi turi bubane muri Paradiso.”
luka:23:44: Urupfu rwa Yesu (Mat 27.45-56; Mar 15.33-41; Yoh 19.28-30)44.Nuko isaha zibaye nk’esheshatu, haza ubwirakabiri mu gihugu cyose kugeza ku isaa cyenda,
luka:23:45: 45.izuba ntiryava, umwenda ukingiriza Ahera cyane h’urusengero utabukamo kabiri.
luka:23:46: 46.Yesu avuga ijwi rirenga ati “Data, mu maboko yawe ni ho nshyize ubugingo bwanjye.” Amaze kuvuga atyo umwuka urahera.
luka:23:47: 47.Nuko umutware w’abasirikare abonye ibibaye ahimbaza Imana ati “Ni ukuri uyu muntu yari umukiranutsi.”
luka:23:48: 48.Inteko z’abantu bari bateraniye aho kurebera, babonye ibibaye basubirayo bikubita mu bituza.
luka:23:49: 49.N’incuti ze zose n’abagore bavanye i Galilaya, bari bahagaze kure babireba.
luka:23:50: Yosefu ahamba Yesu (Mat 27.57-66; Mar 15.42-47; Yoh 19.38-42)50.Umuntu witwaga Yosefu, yari umujyanama wo mu Bayuda, w’umunyangeso nziza kandi ukiranuka.
luka:23:51: 51.Uwo ntiyafatanije n’inama zabo n’ibyo bakoze, yari Umunyarimataya, umudugudu w’Abayuda, na we yategerezaga ubwami bw’Imana.
luka:23:52: 52.Nuko ajya kwa Pilato asaba intumbi ya Yesu.
luka:23:53: 53.Arayibambura ayizingira mu mwenda w’igitare, ayihamba mu mva yakorogoshowe mu rutare, itarahambwamo umuntu.
luka:23:54: 54.Hari ku munsi wo Kwitegura, isabato yenda gusohora.
luka:23:55: 55.Nuko abagore bavanye na Yesu i Galilaya bamukurikiye, babona imva n’intumbi ye uko ihambwe,
luka:23:56: 56.basubirayo batunganya ibihumura neza n’imibavu. Kandi ku munsi w’isabato bararuhuka nk’uko byategetswe.
luka:24:1: Kuzuka kwa Yesu (Mat 28.1-16; Mar 16.1-8; Yoh 20.1-10)1.Ku wa mbere w’iminsi irindwi, kare mu museke bajya ku gituro bajyanye bya bihumura neza batunganije.
luka:24:2: 2.Babona igitare kibirinduye kivuye ku gituro,
luka:24:3: 3.binjiramo ntibasangamo intumbi y’Umwami Yesu.
luka:24:4: 4.Bakiguye mu kantu, abagabo babiri bahagarara aho bari bambaye imyenda irabagirana.
luka:24:5: 5.Abagore baratinya bubika amaso, nuko abo bagabo barababaza bati “Ni iki gitumye mushakira umuzima mu bapfuye?
luka:24:6: 6.Ntari hano ahubwo yazutse. Mwibuke ibyo yavuganye namwe akiri i Galilaya ati
luka:24:7: 7.‘Umwana w’umuntu akwiriye kugambanirwa ngo afatwe n’amaboko y’abanyabyaha, abambwe maze azazuke ku munsi wa gatatu.’ ”
luka:24:8: 8.Bibuka amagambo ye.
luka:24:9: 9.Bava ku gituro basubirayo, ibyo byose babibwira abigishwa cumi n’umwe n’abandi bose.
luka:24:10: 10.Abo ni Mariya Magadalena na Yowana, na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo, n’abandi bagore bari hamwe na bo babwira intumwa ibyo babonye.
luka:24:11: 11.Ariko ayo magambo ababera nk’impuha ntibayemera.
luka:24:12: 12.Maze Petero arahaguruka yirukanka ajya ku gituro, arunama arungurukamo, abona imyenda y’ibitare iri yonyine. Asubira iwe atangazwa n’ibyabaye
luka:24:13: Yesu yiyereka abigishwa babiri bari mu nzira ijya Emawusi13.Nuko uwo munsi babiri muri bo bajyaga mu kirorero cyitwa Emawusi. (Kuva i Yerusalemu kugerayo ni nka sitadiyo mirongo itandatu.)
luka:24:14: 14.Nuko baganira ibyabaye byose.
luka:24:15: 15.Bakiganira babazanya, Yesu arabegera ajyana na bo,
luka:24:16: 16.Ariko amaso yabo arabuzwa ngo batamumenya.
luka:24:17: 17.Arababaza ati “Muragenda mubazanya ibiki?” Bahagarara bagaragaje umubabaro.
luka:24:18: 18.Umwe muri bo witwaga Kilewopa aramusubiza ati “Mbese ni wowe wenyine mu bashyitsi b’i Yerusalemu, utazi ibyahabaye muri iyi minsi?”
luka:24:19: 19.Arababaza ati “Ni ibiki?” Bati “Ni ibya Yesu w’i Nazareti, wari umuhanuzi ukomeye mu byo yakoraga n’ibyo yavugaga imbere y’Imana n’imbere y’abantu bose,
luka:24:20: 20.kandi twavuganaga uburyo abatambyi bakuru n’abatware bacu, bamutanze ngo acirwe urubanza rwo gupfa bakamubamba,
luka:24:21: 21.kandi twiringiraga yuko ari we uzacungura Abisirayeli. Uretse ibyo, dore uyu munsi ni uwa gatatu uhereye aho ibyo byabereye.
luka:24:22: 22.None abagore bo muri twe badutangaje, kuko bazindutse bajya ku gituro
luka:24:23: 23.ntibasangamo intumbi ye. Nuko baraza batubwira ko babonekewe n’abamarayika, bakababwira ko ari muzima.
luka:24:24: 24.Kandi bamwe mu bari bari kumwe na twe bagiye ku gituro basanga ari ko biri, uko abagore batubwiye, ariko we ntibamubona.”
luka:24:25: 25.Arababwira ati “Mwa bapfu mwe, imitima yanyu itinze cyane kwizera ibyo abahanuzi bavuze byose.
luka:24:26: 26.None se Kristo ntiyari akwiriye kubabazwa atyo, ngo abone kwinjira mu bwiza bwe?”
luka:24:27: 27.Atangirira kuri Mose no ku bahanuzi bose, abasobanurira mu byanditswe byose ibyanditswe kuri we.
luka:24:28: 28.Bageze bugufi bw’ikirorero bajyagamo, agira nk’ushaka kugicaho.
luka:24:29: 29.Baramuhata bati “Se waretse tukagumana kuko bwije kandi umunsi ukaba ukuze?” Nuko arinjira ngo agumane na bo.
luka:24:30: 30.Yicaye ngo asangire na bo, yenda umutsima arawushimira, arawumanyagura arawubaha.
luka:24:31: 31.Amaso yabo arahumuka baramumenya, maze aburira imbere yabo ntibongera kumubona.
luka:24:32: 32.Baravugana bati “Yewe, ntiwibuka ukuntu imitima yacu yari ikeye, ubwo yavuganaga natwe turi mu nzira adusobanurira ibyanditswe!”
luka:24:33: 33.Uwo mwanya barahaguruka basubira i Yerusalemu, basanga abo cumi n’umwe bateranye hamwe n’abandi,
luka:24:34: 34.bumva bavuga bati “Ni ukuri Umwami Yesu yazutse, ndetse yabonekeye Simoni.”
luka:24:35: 35.Nuko ba bandi babiri na bo babatekerereza ibyabereye mu nzira, n’uburyo bamumenyeshejwe n’uko amanyaguye umutsima.
luka:24:36: Yesu yiyereka abigishwa be (Mat 28.16-20; Mar 16.14-18; Yoh 20.19-23; Ibyak 1.6-8)36.Bakivuga ibyo, Yesu ahagarara hagati yabo arababwira ati “Amahoro abe muri mwe.”
luka:24:37: 37.Maze barikanga, bagira ubwoba bwinshi bagira ngo ni umuzimu babonye.
luka:24:38: 38.Arababwira ati “Ikibahagaritse imitima ni iki, kandi ni iki gitumye mwiburanya mu mitima yanyu?
luka:24:39: 39.Nimurebe ibiganza byanjye n’ibirenge byanjye, mumenye ko ari jye ubwanjye. Ndetse nimunkoreho murebe, kuko umuzimu atagira umubiri n’amagufwa nk’ibyo mundebana.”
luka:24:40: 40.Avuze ibyo abereka ibiganza bye n’ibirenge bye.
luka:24:41: 41.Nuko ibinezaneza bikibabujije kubyemera, bagitangara arababaza ati “Hari icyo kurya mufite hano?”
luka:24:42: 42.Bamuha igice cy’ifi yokeje,
luka:24:43: 43.aracyakira akirira imbere yabo.
luka:24:44: Yesu asezera ku bigishwa be44.Maze arababwira ati “Aya ni amagambo nababwiraga nkiri kumwe namwe, yuko ibyanditswe kuri jye byose mu mategeko ya Mose, no mu byahanuwe no muri Zaburi bikwiriye gusohora.”
luka:24:45: 45.Maze abungura ubwenge ngo basobanukirwe n’ibyanditswe,
luka:24:46: 46.ati “Ni ko byanditswe ko Kristo akwiriye kubabazwa no kuzuka ku munsi wa gatatu,
luka:24:47: 47.kandi ko kwihana no kubabarirwa ibyaha bikwiriye kubwirwa amahanga yose mu izina rye, bahereye kuri Yerusalemu.
luka:24:48: 48.Ni mwe bagabo b’ibyo.
luka:24:49: 49.Kandi dore ngiye kuboherereza ibyo Data yasezeranye, ariko mugume mu murwa kugeza ubwo muzambikwa imbaraga zivuye mu ijuru.”
luka:24:50: Yesu ajya mu ijuru (Mar 16.19-20; Ibyak 1.9-11)50.Abajyana hanze, abageza i Betaniya arambura amaboko hejuru, abaha umugisha.
luka:24:51: 51.Akibaha umugisha atandukanywa na bo, ajyanwa mu ijuru.
luka:24:52: 52.Na bo baramuramya, basubirana i Yerusalemu umunezero mwinshi,
luka:24:53: 53.baguma mu rusengero iteka bashima Imana.
